data.title: List of oldest living state leaders
data.meta_description: This is a list of the oldest living state leaders, and it is comprised of the 100 oldest living current and former heads of state. Incumbents will be shown in bold italics. This list correlates with the Wikipedia page of the same name. Here is the Wikipedia page.       Currently in office...
data.text:
